fixed_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 101.4%/106.5%/111.5% of Attack.
fixed_skill.name: Spirit Strike

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to all foes equal to 77.1/80.6/84.1% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 50% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Psycho Blast

innate_skill.desc: Restore 6.5% of max HP and SP after winning a battle.
innate_skill.name: Life Aid IV

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 6%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master IV

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. Activate even in reserve: Each time an ally deals damage of a different attribute, grant Kohryu 1 stack of Four Gods. Stacks up to 4 times. When user has 4 stacks of Four Gods at the start of their turn, spend all stacks to gain Four Gods' Might. Four Gods' Might: Increase user's Attack by 20%, and increase party's Attack by 10% for 1 turn. Change Kohryu's skills.
passive_skill.name: Auspicious Sign

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. Activate even in reserve: Each time an ally deals damage of a different attribute, grant Kohryu 1 stack of Four Gods. Stacks up to 4 times. When user has 4 stacks of Four Gods at the start of their turn, spend all stacks to gain Four Gods' Might. Four Gods' Might: Increase user's Attack by 20%, and increase party's Attack by 10% for 2 turns. Change Kohryu's skills.
passive_skill.name: Auspicious Sign I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. Activates even in reserve: Each time an ally deals damage of a different attribute, grant Kohryu 1 stack of Four Gods. Stacks up to 4 times. When user has 4 stacks at the start of their turn, spend all stacks to gain Four Gods' Might. Four Gods' Might: Increase user's Attack by 30%, and increase party's Attack by 10% for 2 turns. Change Kohryu's skills.
passive_skill.name: Auspicious Sign II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. Activate even in reserve: Each time an ally deals damage of a different attribute, grant Kohryu 1 stack of Four Gods. Stacks up to 4 times. When user has 4 stacks at the start of their turn, spend all stacks to gain Four Gods' Might. Four Gods' Might: Increase user's Attack by 30%, and increase other allies' Attack by 15% for 2 turns. Change Kohryu's skills.
passive_skill.name: Auspicious Sign III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
